resources:
BankDemo REGISTER SCAN SIGN IN OR CANCEL Help The permission is missing.

To grant this permission click on Settings, then Permissions and turn the permission on.

Then click back twice to return to the app Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the 'my location' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the 'my location' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.
If the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > 'Google Maps API Demos'. Location permission is required for this demo. Quit Settings please enable missing permission
E-mail Position e-mail address in this frame
Date> Position date in this frame
Raw text Position text in this frame
Please choose: Voice authentication Facial authentication
